add_sample_form_intro: Fill in the details for your new sample below
add_samples_intro_message: Add the pages or views to be included in the audit as samples
all_remaining_approved: All remaining unreviewed requirements have been marked as passed
all_updated_assessments_confirmed_toast: All updated assessments have been confirmed.
all_updated_assessments_handled: All updated assessments have been handled.
all_updates_handled_text: You have reviewed all requirements affected by the rule file update. You can now return to the audit overview.
audit_already_started_or_locked: Audit has already started or is locked
audit_locked_no_edit: The audit is locked. Editing is not allowed.
audit_not_locked_for_export: The audit must be locked to export. Current status: {status}
audit_not_started_yet: The audit has not yet been started
autosave_restored_successfully: The audit has been restored from the automatic backup.
browser_does_not_support_download: Your browser does not support direct file downloads
cannot_change_criteria_if_check_not_comp: Criteria cannot be changed when the checkpoint is marked 'Does not comply'
check_marked_as_not_compliant_criteria_p: The checkpoint is marked as 'Does not comply'; underlying criteria have been automatically marked as passed and are not shown.
comment_to_auditor: Internal note (not visible in the final report)
condition_not_met_criteria_auto_passed: Since the condition does not apply, these points are automatically passed.
confirm_all_remaining_approved: All remaining unreviewed requirements have been marked as passed.
confirm_all_reviewed_dialog_message: Are you sure? This will keep the existing assessment (Passed/Failed) for all {count} updated requirements and mark them as reviewed.
confirm_approve_all_message: Are you sure you want to mark all remaining unreviewed requirements for this sample as 'Passed'?
confirm_delete_sample: Are you sure you want to delete the sample "{sampleName}"?
confirm_restore_autosave: An unsaved audit for '{actorName}' from {timestamp} was found. Do you want to restore it? If you choose no, the backup will be deleted.
content_types_instruction: Tick all content types you can find in this sample.
critical_error_language_system_init_fail: Critical error: Language system could not be initialised. Check console.
critical_error_saving_session_data_lost: Critical error: Could not save audit data to session. Data may be lost on reload.
critical_error_system_render_view_failed: System error: View could not be rendered. Check console.
edit_metadata_form_instruction: Update the information below. The changes will be reflected in exported reports.
error_audit_data_missing_for_list: Error: Required audit data (rule file) is missing to display the list.
error_component_load: Error: Component for view "{viewName}" could not be loaded (invalid structure or not defined).
error_file_must_be_json: The file must be in JSON format.
error_internal_cannot_start_audit_deps_m: Internal error: Cannot start audit due to missing dependencies.
error_internal_data_structure_pc: Internal error: Invalid data structure for updating pass criterion.
error_invalid_saved_audit_file: The selected file is not a valid saved audit file or is corrupt.
error_loading_data_for_view: Could not load data for view: {viewName}
error_loading_sample_list_for_overview: Error: The sample list could not be loaded for the overview.
error_loading_sample_or_requirement_data: Error: Could not load data for the sample or requirement.
error_loading_view_details: Could not load view: {viewName}. See console for technical details.
error_boundary_title: An error occurred in the application
error_boundary_user_message: Sorry, something went wrong. The application could not display the requested view correctly.
error_boundary_suggestions: You can try reloading the page, going back to the previous page, or contact support if the problem persists.
error_boundary_notification_message: An error occurred in the application
error_min_one_content_type: At least one content type must be selected.
error_no_active_audit: Error: No active audit to display. Start a new one or load an existing one.
error_no_active_audit_to_save_metadata: Error: No active audit found to save metadata.
error_no_rulefile_for_form: Error: Rule file is missing to build the form.
error_no_rulefile_loaded_for_metadata: Error: No rule file is loaded. Please upload a rule file to enter metadata.
error_no_samples_to_start_audit: You must add at least one sample to start the audit.
error_reading_session_data_lost: Error reading saved session. Previous data may be lost.
error_render_add_sample_form_deps_missin: Could not render form due to missing dependencies.
error_render_metadata_view: Could not render the metadata view.
error_render_requirement_audit_view: Could not render the requirement audit view.
error_render_requirement_list_view: Could not render the requirement list view.
error_render_sample_management_view_deps: Could not render sample management due to missing dependencies.
error_saving_audit: An error occurred while saving the audit.
error_set_check_status_first: Please set the main checkpoint status ('Complies'/'Does not comply') first.
excel_status_select_from_list: Please select a valid value from the list ({list})
final_confirm_updates_intro: You are about to approve the existing assessments for all {count} updated requirements. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
handle_updated_assessments_intro: The list below shows all requirements that have been changed. You can either approve all existing assessments with one click, or review and approve each requirement individually. You can also click a requirement's title to perform a new, detailed assessment.
metadata_form_instruction: All fields are optional. This information will be included in exported reports.
metadata_updated_successfully: The audit information has been updated.
no_actions_available: No actions are available at the moment.
no_audit_metadata_available: No audit metadata is available at the moment.
no_checks_for_this_requirement: No checkpoints are defined for this requirement.
no_failed_requirements_to_export: There are no failed requirements to export.
no_relevant_requirements_for_sample: No relevant requirements were found for this sample based on the selected content types.
no_requirements_match_filter: No requirements match the current filter.
no_requirements_to_approve: There are no remaining unreviewed requirements to approve.
no_samples_added: No samples have been added yet.
pc_observation_detail_label: Describe the observation, specifying where and how it is deficient.
relevant_requirements_for_sample: Displaying all relevant requirements for the sample: {sampleDescription}
requirement_updated_needs_review: This requirement has been updated since the last review. Please verify your assessment below.
restore_session_confirm_button: Yes, continue where I left off
restore_session_lead_text: A backup of an ongoing audit was found.
restore_session_question: Do you want to continue where you left off?
rule_file_invalid_json: The uploaded file is not valid JSON.
rule_file_loaded_successfully: Rule file '{filename}' successfully loaded and validated.
rule_file_metadata_contenttypes_array_of: Rule file 'metadata.contentTypes' must be an array of objects, where each object has non-empty strings for 'id' and 'text'.
rule_file_metadata_missing_pagetypes_con: Required 'pageTypes' and/or 'contentTypes' are missing within the 'metadata' object in the rule file.
rule_file_metadata_must_be_object: Rule file 'metadata' must be an object.
rule_file_metadata_pagetypes_array_of_st: Rule file 'metadata.pageTypes' must be an array of non-empty strings.
rule_file_metadata_title_required: Rule file 'metadata.title' is required and cannot be empty.
rule_file_missing_keys: The rule file is missing required keys: {missingKeys}
rule_file_requirement_id_empty: The requirement's ID (for '{requirementTitleOrKey}') must be a non-empty string.
rule_file_requirement_invalid_object: A requirement (key: {requirementKey}) in the rule file is not a valid object.
rule_file_requirement_missing_keys: A requirement in the rule file (ID: {requirementId}) is missing required fields: {missingKeys}
rule_file_requirements_must_be_object: The 'requirements' section of the rule file must be an object (not an array).
sample_description_auto_filled: The description has been auto-filled with the page type, but can be edited.
sample_edit_confirm_added_reqs_header: The following requirements will be ADDED to this sample for review:
sample_edit_confirm_data_loss_warning_he: WARNING: You are about to permanently delete saved work!
sample_edit_confirm_data_loss_warning_te: The assessments and comments you have entered for the removed requirements listed above will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
sample_edit_confirm_removed_reqs_header: The following requirements and all saved work will be REMOVED from this sample:
score_progress_bar_could_not_be_loaded: Score progress bar could not be loaded.
show_existing_samples: Don't save and continue to the audit overview
todo_next_unhandled_requirement: TODO Navigate to next unhandled requirement
update_rulefile_backup_text: It is strongly recommended to save a backup of your current audit before proceeding.
update_rulefile_confirm_intro: The new rule file has been analysed. Please review the changes below before confirming.
update_rulefile_report_intro: The rule file has been updated. Below is a summary of the changes.
update_rulefile_step2_text: Select the new, updated JSON rule file from your computer.
update_rulefile_success: The rule file was successfully updated.
update_rulefile_warning_intro: You are about to update the rule file for an ongoing audit. This is an advanced action with the following consequences:
update_rulefile_warning_li1: Results for requirements that are removed from the new rule file will be permanently deleted.
update_rulefile_warning_li2: Requirements that have been changed will be marked for re-review.
upload_view_intro: Welcome! Please upload a saved audit or start a new audit by uploading a rule file.
validation_internal_schema_error: Internal validation error: Schema definition is missing or corrupt.
warning_save_file_newer_version: Warning: The save file is from a newer version of the tool ({fileVersionInFile} vs {appVersion}).
add_sample_form_new_intro: A sample can be a web page, a view in an app, a product, etc.
upload_view_actions_title: What would you like to do?
upload_view_description_resume_audit: Resume a previous audit by uploading the saved file.
upload_view_description_start_new: Start a new accessibility audit from scratch by uploading a rule file.
upload_view_description_edit_rulefile: Make changes to an existing rule file or create a new version.
edit_rulefile_intro: You are now editing the rule file: {rulefileTitle}. Choose which part you want to work on.
rulefile_metadata_intro: All metadata from the loaded rule file is shown below.
rulefile_metadata_missing: No metadata is available right now.
rulefile_metadata_edit_intro: Update the details below and save when you are done.
rulefile_metadata_edit_saved: The rule file metadata has been updated.
rulefile_metadata_field_keywords_hint: Enter one keyword per line or separate them with commas.
rulefile_metadata_edit_page_types_placeh: Suggestion: present selectable page types with add, remove and reorder controls.
rulefile_metadata_edit_content_types_pla: Suggestion: use an expandable hierarchy editor where parent types reveal child forms.
rulefile_metadata_edit_samples_placehold: Suggestion: combine a table view with an inline form to manage sample categories and types.
rulefile_metadata_edit_taxonomies_placeh: Suggestion: render each taxonomy in a card with versioning and concept lists that can be edited dynamically.
confirm_delete_requirement: Are you sure you want to delete the requirement "{reqTitle}"? This action cannot be undone.
check_condition_label: What must be true to perform the check?
pass_criterion_field_label: What can be approved or rejected?
rulefile_confirm_delete_intro: You are about to permanently delete the folloging requirement:
rulefile_confirm_delete_warning: This will also remove all existing assessments made for this requirement in all samples. This action cannot be undone.
rulefile_edit_requirements_intro: Here you can view and edit all requirements defined in the current rule file.
feature_not_implemented_yet: This feature is not yet implemented.
rulefile_edit_requirement_intro: Modify the fields below to update the requirement. When you are finished, return to the list and save the updated rule file.
check_logic_or: At least one must be met (OR)
confirm_delete_check_intro: You are about to delete the checkpoint:
confirm_delete_criterion_intro: You are about to delete the pass criterion:
metadata_editor_placeholder: The metadata editor is under construction. Full functionality will arrive in a later version.
error_internal_reload: Internal error: try reloading the page.
rule_file_invalid_json_with_detail: The file must be in JSON format. Technical detail: {errorMessage}
all_requirements_handled_for_sample: All requirements reviewed for this sample
rule_file_must_have_at_least_one_require: The rule file must contain at least one requirement
markdown_error_rendering_preview: Error rendering preview. Check console for details.
restore_session_error_display: Error: Could not display restore session options.
error_no_pending_sample_changes: No pending sample changes were found.
confirm_delete_report_section: Are you sure you want to delete this section?
